effect.dragonsurvival.stress.description: A forest dragon gets this effect if it stays too long in the dark. Takes away all satiation and quickly depletes hunger.
effect.dragonsurvival.royal_chase.descri: Gives to all who attack royalty and their friends. Keeps the villagers from trading and they scatter in fear. Saves dragon hunter squads next to the player. Can be removed by the Hero of the Village effect. If you don't see how much time left to the end of the effect - it just means that the effect lasts longer than 20 minutes.
effect.dragonsurvival.trapped.descriptio: The catch net completely immobilizes the player.
effect.dragonsurvival.fire.description: Protects cave dragons from the damaging effects of water.
effect.dragonsurvival.animal_peace.descr: Animals stop running away from animals and react the same way they do to people.
effect.dragonsurvival.water_vision.descr: Like night vision, but only works underwater. Sea Dragon Skill.
effect.dragonsurvival.lava_vision.descri: Improves visibility in the lava. Cave dragon skill.
effect.dragonsurvival.hunter.description: Boosts the forest dragon. Makes him invisible in the grass for a few seconds. Invisibility works not only on players, but also on monsters.
effect.dragonsurvival.revealing_the_soul: Multiplies the experience gained from mobs. Sea dragon skill.
effect.dragonsurvival.burn.description: The target takes damage from movement. The cave dragon skill.
effect.dragonsurvival.charged.descriptio: Transmits an electrical impulse between monsters and deals ricochet damage.
effect.dragonsurvival.drain.description: Poisonous gas of the forest dragon, capable of growing plants, but poisonous to living organisms.
effect.dragonsurvival.strong_leather.des: Additional armor points. The cave dragon skill.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_cave.descrip: Wings of the cave dragon. You can assign the flight activation to another key.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_forest.descr: Wings of the forest dragon. You can assign the flight activation to another key.
effect.dragonsurvival.wings_sea.descript: Wings of the sea dragon. You can assign the flight activation to another key.
effect.dragonsurvival.source_of_magic.de: Gives the dragon inexhaustible mana to use magic.
effect.dragonsurvival.royal_departure.de: Despawns creatures with the royal_departure_affected tag when the effect ends. By default these are princes and princesses.
death.attack.starDrain: %1$s had their life and energy drained by magic.
death.attack.starDrain.player: %1$s had their life and energy drained by magic while trying to escape %2$s.
death.attack.waterBurn.player: %1$s tried to swim in water to escape %2$s.
death.attack.rainBurn: %1$s spent too long in the rain.
death.attack.rainBurn.player: %1$s spent too much time in the rain trying to escape %2$s.
ds.cave_dragon_choice: In the depths of your soul the lava began to roar. You have become a §cCave dragon.§r
ds.forest_dragon_choice: You feel the need for raw meat and are covered in grass scales. You have chosen to be a §aForest dragon.§r
ds.sea_dragon_choice: The stormy sea and fishes beckon you. Now you are a §3Sea dragon.§r
ds.choice_human: You have awakened from your sleep and become a Human.
ds.wings.nohunger: Hunger has exhausted you and you can't fly
ds.you.have.no.wings: You have §cno wings§r. You need to talk to the Ender dragon or take special item.
ds.dragon.grants.wings: <Ender dragon> I bestow wings on you. Now get out of here!
ds.space.occupied: You need a 3x3 area to place
ds.invalid_grow_item: §6You need another type of growth artifact:§r %1$s
ds.gui.tab_button.2: If you have any questions about Dragon Survival, visit the Github Wiki!
ds.help.altar:
§6■ Welcome to Dragon Survival!§r
■ Choose which dragon you want to become. Each has its pros and cons. Point to the clues to learn more.§r
§r■§7 You can change your decision in the future, but it can have its consequences.§r
§r■§7 And don't forget to delete old configs if you update our mod! This will avoid many bugs. Enjoy the game! :3
ds.help.customization:
■ Did you choose dragon species? Good! Now it's time to §6customize§r your dragon. Just choose the pieces and change their color as you like.

■ You can return to editing at any time. Any changes will be §6saved§r, even if you accidentally close the editor. Use the slots on the right to save some of your favorite results.

■ If you don't know where to start, use the "§6randomize§r" button on the top right.§r

§r-§7 Shaders can affect the result. This is especially noticeable on glowing textures.§r
§r-§7 The texture from this editor is only visible if your custom skins are turned off. You can learn how to create your own custom skins on Wiki or on our discord server.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.size_info: You can also change the visual §6size§r of the dragon slightly, but it won't affect the hitbox size in any way.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.default_skin.toolti: If you want old textures or are using a §6texture pack§r, check this box.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.wings.tooltip: Only affects visuals. Not available for Western and Central body types.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.copy: Click here to copy the slot settings for other growth stages.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.save_slot: You can select any slot here and the result will be automatically saved.
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.all:
With your current config settings all progress will be lost when you change.

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.ability:
With your current config settings your growth progress will be lost when you change.

Would you still like to continue?
ds.gui.dragon_editor.confirm.growth:
With your current config settings your ability progress will be lost when you change.

Would you still like to continue?
dragonsurvival:config.category.general.t: General config options for Dragon Survival
ds.endmessage.1: Have you come here for the spin wings, {0}? Get out, before its too late.
ds.endmessage.2: This is my land, {0}, show some respect. Go away, but first answer, why have you come here. Is it for spin wings?
ds.endmessage.3: You have gone through lot to get here, {0}, what do you wish?
ds.altar_dragon_info.cave_dragon:
§c■ Cave dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r fire resistance, pickaxe claws, fire magic, faster movement on cave blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r water.
§6■ Ration:§r
{0}
ds.altar_dragon_info.forest_dragon:
§a■ Forest dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r soft fall, axe claws, poison magic, faster movement on forest blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r dark caves.
§6■ Ration:§r
{0}
ds.altar_dragon_info.sea_dragon:
§3■ Sea dragon.§r
§2■ Features:§f§r underwater breathing, shovel claws, electric magic, faster movement on sea blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r dry air.
§6■ Ration:§r
{0}
ds.altar_dragon_info.human:
■ §nHuman.§r
■ Homo sapiens.§r
Traveler, builder and creator.
ds.skill.help_1:
■ §6Active skills§r are used in combat.
- §9Skill power§r depends of your level. Look at the skill line above. Higher EXP level = stronger active skills.
- §9Experience or mana§r points are used to cast spells.
- §9Controls§r - check in-game Minecraft control settings! You can drag and drop this skills icons around.
ds.skill.help_1_alt:
■ §6Active skills§r are used in combat.
- §9Experience or mana§r points are used to cast spells.
- §9Controls§r - check in the game settings! You can drag and drop this skills icons around.
ds.skill.help_2:
■ §aPassive skills§r levels do not disappear after lose EXP and can be upgraded.
- §9Mana§r - do not forget use the Source of Magic and Dragons Treats for an infinite supply of mana!
- §9More information§r can be found in Wiki and Discord. Check Curseforge mod page.
ds.skill.help_2_alt:
■ §aPassive skills§r can be upgraded like Active skills, but it is work all the time.
- §9Mana§r - do not forget use the Source of Magic and Dragons Treats for an infinite supply of mana!
- §9More information§r can be found in Wiki and Discord. Check Curseforge mod page.
ds.skill.help_3: ■ §dInnate passive skills§r is a dragon features. The pros and cons of your species. Mostly play an informational role.
ds.skill.help.claws:
■ This is the §6dragon inventory§r.
§7■ Differences from the vanilla inventory: 3x3 craft, expanded window where your whole dragon fits, claw panel, button to sort items.§r
■ Any dragon is §6born§r with strong claws and teeth, but you can make them even better! Just put §6any tools§r§f here in these slots and your bare paw will have stronger characteristics.
§7■ Does not stack with «Claws and Teeth» skill, which affects only if these slots are empty.
ds.help.source_of_magic:
■ The source of magic can be filled with parts of Elder dragon. Spends 1 item every 10 seconds.
■ Crouch + right click to use.

■ §6+10 sec§r - Elder Dragon Dust
■ §6+50 sec§r - Elder Dragon Bone
■ §6+100 sec§r - Dragon Heart Shard
■ §6+300 sec§r - Weak Dragon Heart
■ §6+1000 sec§r - Elder Dragon Heart
ds.skill.description.storm_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of sparks. Targets become §c«Electrified»§r and deal electric shock damage to each other. The more targets affected, the more damage dealt. 

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon. Makes creepers charged. During a storm will summon thunderbolts.
ds.skill.description.ball_lightning:
■ Ranged attack: shoots out a ball lightning. Deals area damage and §celectrifies§r enemies.

■ During rain and storms, lightning can strike the ball.
ds.skill.description.revealing_the_soul:
■ Massive buff: temporary increases amount of §2experience§r gained from monsters. 

■ Has a limit of maximum amount of experience you can gain at a time. Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_eyes:
■ Personal buff: providing §2Night Vision§r for a short time.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.sea_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores on wet blocks.

■ Current amount of §2{0}§r mana:
 - §2{1}§r from «Sea Magic»
 - §2{2}§r from level of dragon
 - §2{3}§r body type
ds.skill.description.sea_athletics:
■ Running on some blocks will give you §2Speed {1}§r

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.water:
■ Increases out-of-water survival time. Will help you to stay alive a little longer in deserted regions and Nether.

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.spectral_impact: ■ Gives §c{0}%§r chance to make your attack ignore enemy armor.
ds.skill.description.sea_claws_and_teeth:
■ Sea dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and dig loose blocks without tools. They are getting stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but they are rarely born with the knowledge of it. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [{0}]
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in water.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in water.
ds.skill.description.sea_dragon:
■ Sea dragons are made of water and gold. Their diet includes a variety of seafood. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate immunity to lightning and §2unlimited oxygen§r§7. They feel best in the sea.§r
ds.skill.description.amphibian:
■ Sun and dryness are the main foes of sea dragons. If they are out-of-water for too long, they begin to take damage.

■ The skill «Water», effect «Sea Peace», rain, ice, snow and water bottles §7could make your life easier.

■ Damage: §c{0} points in {1}s§r
ds.skill.description.poisonous_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a toxic gas. Creates area of §c«Forest Gas»§r effect, which is deadly for creatures, but boosts plant grow speed.

■ Range depends on the age of the dragon. Cannot be used while affected by «Stress»."
ds.skill.description.spike: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out a sharp §cdart§r, which flies a large distance. Less effective underwater.
ds.skill.description.inspiration:
■ Massive buff: provides effect §2Haste III§r for all nearby creatures.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.hunter:
■ Personal buff: providing §2Hunter§r effect, which allows you to become invisible in grass. Faster running. First melee strike of the hunter has §c{0}§r damage bonus.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight. Effect is nullified after being hurt.
ds.skill.description.forest_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores under direct sunlight and on grass.

■ Current amount of §2{0}§r mana:
 - §2{1}§r from «Forest Magic»
 - §2{2}§r from level of dragon
 - §2{3}§r from body type
ds.skill.description.forest_athletics:
■ Running on wooden or grassy blocks will give you §2Speed {1}§r

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.light_in_darkness: ■ Allows you to stay longer in a dark. Time until effect «Stress» appear in low light level: §2{0}s§r.
ds.skill.description.cliffhanger: Landing becomes much softer. Safe fall distance: §2{0}b§r.
ds.skill.description.forest_claws_and_te:
■ Forest dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and chop down trees without tools. They are getting stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [{0}]
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.has_sp: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in water. Just use the attack.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings.no_spi: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in water.
ds.skill.description.forest_dragon:
■ Forest dragons are made up of diamonds and predatory plants. Their diet includes raw meat and sweet berries. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate §2immunity to thorn bushes and cacti§r§7. They feel best on the surface.
ds.skill.description.fear_of_dark:
■ Predatory plants in the body of the forest dragon do not like §dDarkness§r. If the light level is lower than {0}, §c«Stress»§r effect appears which resets saturation and quickly decreases hunger value.

■ The skill «Light the Dark» and effect «Forest Magic» §7could make your life easier.
ds.description.hot_dragon_rod: ■§7 Rubbing dragon dust into a hot rod produces a very tasty and crispy snack. Gives enough heat to cave dragons to stay under water.
ds.description.explosive_copper: ■§7 Cave dragon dessert. Dangerous and unstable.
ds.description.quartz_explosive_copper: ■§7 A high-pressure heated rattlesnake mixture of quartz and explosive copper is a favorite dish of cave dragons. It removes wither and poison effects, as well as protects them and heals their wounds.
ds.description.double_quartz: ■§7 By squeezing two varieties of quartz in your paws and crushing, you can combine them. This greatly improves taste of crystals.
ds.description.sweet_sour_rabbit: ■§7 Freshly-caught rabbit is great on its own, but if you marinate it with a spider's eye and honey it makes a terrific dish that you wouldn't be ashamed to serve at the holidays. Clear all a effects out of a forest dragons.
ds.description.luminous_ointment: ■§7 Forest dragons feel physical pain when visiting dark caves and their own plants begin to devour them alive. To increase their resistance, these dragons apply a special glowing ointment to their body.
ds.description.diamond_chorus: ■§7 This rare exotic delicacy is prepared in a very interesting way. Whole diamonds are difficult to eat. So the forest dragons process them with The Dragon Breath. A diamond becomes friable and is placed inside several chorus fruits. It strengthens the body of forest dragons and heals, as well as removes wither and poisoning effects.
ds.description.smelly_meat_porridge: ■§7 Forest dragon plants need good nutrition. This meat and bone fertilizer is perfect for that.
ds.description.meat_wild_berries: ■§7 Raw meat goes well with sweet berries and wild herbs. Any forest dragon will attest to this.
ds.description.meat_chorus_mix: ■§7 Chorus has always been prized among forest dragons, and when combined with meat, it gives them regeneration.
ds.description.seasoned_fish: ■§7 Any raw fish is suitable for this sea dish. The skin is removed from it and thickly coated with ink. They are absorbed into the fish and give it an unusual taste and hue. The kelp leaf is needed for decoration.
ds.description.golden_coral_pufferfish: ■§7 Before consumption, live coral is pulverized to dust, shaped and then combined with sliced pufferfish in this form. Gold, combined with slicing skill, reduces the dizzying effect, making it safe for consumption. Sea dragons get a regeneration from this dish.
ds.description.frozen_raw_fish: ■§7 Raw ice fish is food and water for sea dragons in one package! Cleanses all effects.
ds.description.golden_turtle_egg: ■§7 A rare dish on sea dragons table. Two small holes are made in a turtle egg, a leaked contents are mixed with dragon dust and gold, and then returned. After a while the dust reacts with egg and shell changes color. Gives protection and regeneration to sea dragons, as well as removes poisoning and wither effects.
ds.description.charred_meat: ■§7 Cave dragons are the most veheterian of all, but this is the exception to the rule.
ds.description.charred_mushroom: ■§7 The pickled mushrooms are fried together with the plate and served as such on cave dragons table.
ds.description.charred_seafood: ■§7 It is very important for the cave dragon to have a minimum of water in the food. The charred = the better!
ds.description.prince_summon: ■§7 The prince sometimes visits towns and villages with his entourage, but you can personally summon him for a short period of time to trade. Prepare swords, flowers and gold in advance. In the final stages sells items to reduce the growth of the dragon. These scrolls can be found in various chests in the world.
ds.description.princess_summon:
■§7 ■§7 Not all royalty condescend to visit ordinary villagers, but that has nothing to do with the Dragon Princesses. They regularly visit villages and towns to trade. They are interested in flowers, gold and rare objects. To the dragons they meet, they sell a variety of food. The princesses are in the service of dragons unknown to anyone and every time they return to them after trading. Stock up on goods before you use the scroll. In the final stages trade unnecessary elder hearts for more useful items.
■ §7Callscrolls can be found in various chests in the world.
ds.skill.description.nether_breath:
■ Elemental breath: a stream of fire that ignites enemies. Creates an area on the surface with §c«Burn»§r effect. Range depends on age of the dragon.

■ Destroys some of the blocks. Cannot be used under water and during the rain.
ds.skill.description.fireball: ■ Ranged attack: shoots out a fireball that §cexplodes§r and sets the area on fire.
ds.skill.description.strong_leather:
■ Massive buff: provides temporary §2armor§r for all nearby creatures.

■ The effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.lava_vision:
■ Personal buff: making lava more §2transparent§r for a while.

■ Effect does not stack. Cannot be used in flight.
ds.skill.description.cave_magic:
■ Magic points (Mana) are used for dragon magic. Restores on hot blocks.

■ Current amount of §2{0}§r mana:
 - §2{1}§r from «Cave Magic»
 - §2{2}§r from level of dragon
 - §2{3}§r from body type
ds.skill.description.cave_athletics:
■ Running on stone surfaces will give you §2Speed {1}§r

■ Duration: §2{0}§rs
ds.skill.description.contrast_shower:
■ Rain, snow and snowfall do not damage you for: §2{0}§rs

■ Water, potions and snowballs are still dangerous
ds.skill.description.burn:
■ Your target has a {0}% chance to receive the §c«Burned»§r effect from your attacks.

The effect deals damage when the target moves.

The faster the movement, the more damage is done.

■ Creatures with fire resistance are immune to this effect.
ds.skill.description.cave_claws_and_teet:
■ Cave dragons §2can§r deal increased damage and mine stone blocks without tools. They are getting stronger with age.

■ §cCannot§r ride horses and use several items.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings:
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability. Only one dragon in this world can share this power with you.

■ Enable flight: [{0}]
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.has_spin: ■ You are able to §2spin§r in air and in lava. Just use the attack.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings.no_spin: ■ You have not yet unlocked the ability to §cspin§r in air and in lava.
ds.skill.description.cave_dragon:
■ Cave dragons are made of netherite and lava. Their diet includes charred meat and coal. Peaceful animals fear dragons.

■ They have innate §2immunity to fire§r and they feel best in the Nether.
ds.skill.description.hot_blood:
■ Cave dragons take §cdamage from water§r, snow, rain and other liquids due to their fiery nature.

■ The skill «Contrast Shower» and effect «Cave Fire» §7could make your life easier.

■ Damage: §c{0} points in {1}s§r
ds.description.caveDoor: ■§7 Large door that only a cave dragon can open.
ds.description.forestDoor: ■§7 Large door that only a forest dragon can open.
ds.description.seaDoor: ■§7 Large door that only a sea dragon can open.
ds.description.legacyDoor: ■§7 The very first big door we added to the mod. Just for nostalgia.
ds.description.grayHelmet: ■§7 Poor hunter. Fortunately, you didn't know him.
ds.description.goldHelmet: ■§7 You surely remember that the knight wore dark armor. Where did the golden helmet come from?
ds.description.blackHelmet: ■§7 You should have used the Eye of Innos.
ds.description.dragonBeacon: ■§7 Required to create dragon beacons. Silk touch is required. When crafting a vanilla beacon returns.
ds.description.passivePeaceBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Sea Peace» and «Animal Calm». Best for sea dragons. Peaceful animals stop running away from the dragon. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.passiveMagicBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Forest Magic» and «Haste». Best for forest dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.passiveFireBeacon: ■§7 Gives the effects «Cave Fire» and «Sturdy Skin». Gives extra armor. Best for cave dragons. You can buy an effect by pressing the right button in exchange for experience. Requires a silk touch.
ds.description.dragonMemoryBlock: ■§7 If set under any dragon beacon, you can get its effect in the area without having to buy it.
ds.description.dragonAltar: ■§7 Block to turn into a dragon and decor.
ds.description.elderDragonDust:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The smallest particle left from an ancient creature. Used in many dragon crafts. Can be found in ore, treasuries and trade with royalty.
ds.description.elderDragonBone:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The remains of small dragons that were created from the body of an elder creature that sacrificed itself to save the world. Used in many dragon crafts.
ds.description.heartElement:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Fragment from a little dragon's heart. Used for newborn dragon's growth. It drops with a rare chance from weak monsters.
ds.description.weakDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Strengthened, but still unstable heart. Used for young dragon's growth. It drops with a rare chance from monsters.
ds.description.elderDragonHeart:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The Heart that is radiant and full of energy. If you listen, you can hear elder voice calling you from the depths. Used for adult dragon's growth. It drops with a rare chance from strong monsters.
ds.description.starBone: ■§7 This item slightly reduces the dragon's growth. Sold from the prince and found in chests.
ds.description.starHeart: ■§7 Totally stops the dragon's growth. Repeated use activates growth. Endless. Purchased from a prince.
ds.description.caveDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores cave dragon's mana and slightly quenches hunger. Gives the effect of infinite mana.
ds.description.forestDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores forest dragon's mana and slightly quenches hunger. Gives the effect of infinite mana.
ds.description.seaDragonTreat: ■§7 Fully restores sea dragon's mana and slightly quenches hunger. Gives the effect of infinite mana.
ds.description.chargedCoal: ■§7 Can be used to melt a large number of items. More profitable than a block of coal. Removes all effects for a cave dragons and saturates.
ds.description.chargedSoup: ■§7 Good food for the cave dragon. Gives the effect "Cave Fire" that protects from the damaging effects of water.
ds.description.wing_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the skill to fly. Use repeatedly to remove wings.
ds.description.spin_grant: ■§7 This item gives your dragon the skill to fly spin. Use repeatedly to remove fly spin. The use can be reassigned to another key in control settings.
ds.description.treasures: ■§7 Dragons can sleep and regenerate mana and health very slowly here. To speed up this process, accumulate plenty of treasure. The main purpose is to show the richness of a dragon.
ds.description.cave_source_of_magic: ■§7 Cave dragons can gets infinite mana here. Deals damage to other creatures.
ds.description.forest_source_of_magic: ■§7 Forest dragons can gets infinite mana here. Deals damage to other creatures.
ds.description.sea_source_of_magic: ■§7 Sea dragons can gets infinite mana here. Deals damage to other creatures.
ds.description.dragon_pressure_plate: ■§7 Creates a redstone signal if any dragon steps on it. It does not react to humans.
ds.description.cave_dragon_pressure_plat: ■§7 Creates a redstone signal if a cave dragon steps on it. Can open a cave dragon door, if plate is close to it.
ds.description.forest_dragon_pressure_pl: ■§7 Creates a redstone signal if a forest dragon steps on it. Can open a forest dragon door, if plate is close to it.
ds.description.sea_dragon_pressure_plate: ■§7 Creates a redstone signal if a sea dragon steps on it. Can open a sea dragon door, if plate is close to it.
ds.description.human_pressure_plate: ■§7 Creates a redstone signal only if a human steps on it. Ignores dragons.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.yours: ■ This is what §6you§r look like now.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.random: ■ Shows a random skin of §6other players§r§f. You §ccan't install§r§f them yourself!§7 Only look and admire! >:D
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.help:
■ §6Skin§r is a self-made texture for your dragon. In this tab you can disable the display of the skin for your dragon at different stages, as well as skins of other players.
■ Skins are not linked to a texture, which you can create in our ingame editor.
§7■ If you are interested in how to make your own skin or take a commission, use the buttons on the right.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.discord: ■ Join our §6discord server§r!§7 Read the Rules, FAQ and Wiki before you ask anything.
ds.gui.skins.tooltip.wiki: ■ This is a link to §6Wiki§r dedicated to making your own skin!§7 Remember that this will be very difficult and requires knowledge of graphic editors.
ds.gui.skins.noskin: This author does not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.skins.noskin.yours: You do not have a skin for this stage.
ds.gui.claws.rendering: Toggle showing of claws and teeth.
ds.gui.body_types.center.tooltip:
§6■ Central Type§r
■ Universal inhabitants of all biotopes. Occurs more often than others.
§7You can change your body type at any time with lose growth progress. The choice has a slight effect on characteristics, but is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.north.tooltip:
§6■ Northern Type§r
■ Perfect sea travelers, conquering both water and air. Slower on the ground and weaker physically, but not magically. Shorter than other dragons and therefore fit through smaller holes!
§7You can change your body type at any time with lose growth progress. The choice has a slight effect on characteristics, but is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.east.tooltip:
§6■ Eastern Type§r
■ Adapted to life in caves. Without wings, it is harder for them to use levitation magic, but they do not interfere with swimming. Have a larger supply of mana and armor.
§7You can change your body type at any time with lose growth progress. The choice has a slight effect on characteristics, but is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.south.tooltip:
§6■ Southern Type§r
■ Plains dwellers, capable of high jumping and fast running. The special structure of their paws gives them many advantages. More physically strong, but outsiders in flight and swimming.
§7You can change your body type at any time with lose growth progress. The choice has a slight effect on characteristics, but is mostly cosmetic.
ds.gui.body_types.west.tooltip:
§6■ Western Type§r
■ Conquerors of mountains and skies. They are unrivalled in their element, but are rather clumsy on the ground.
§7■ You can change your body type at any time with lose growth progress. The choice has a slight effect on characteristics, but is mostly cosmetic.
